trans-unit.source: Manages the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> objects for any object that inherits from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 관리 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 에서 상속 하는 모든 개체에 대 한 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Each Windows Form has at least one BindingContext object that manages the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the form.
trans-unit.target: 각 Windows Form에 하나 이상의 BindingContext 개체를 관리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>폼에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class is abstract, the return type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property is either a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>클래스는 추상 클래스의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>속성 중 하나는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> 은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> 반환 형식이</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the <xref:System.Type> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 원본이 있으면 목록 개체), (대신 하나의 속성만 반환할 수 있는 개체에 <xref:System.Type> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> 은</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> as the data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 지정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>데이터 원본으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>반환 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 반대로, 구현 하는 개체 데이터 원본이 경우 <xref:System.Collections.IList>또는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>반환 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form에 각 데이터 원본에 대해 발생 하는 단일 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the BindingContext enables you to retrieve any particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> associated with a data source.
trans-unit.target: 여러 데이터 원본에 연결 된 Windows Form 있을 수 있기 때문에 BindingContext 검색할 수 있도록 특정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>데이터 원본과 관련 된.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property, the BindingContext creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>속성 BindingContext에서는 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>아직 없는 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend.
trans-unit.target: 이 목록 (또는 목록)에 반환 된 개체를 관리 하지 못할 수도 처럼 일부 혼란이 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To prevent returning an invalid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the intended <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: 잘못 된 반환 하지 않도록 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>여부를 확인 하는 메서드를 의도 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>이미 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: If you use a container control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, to contain data-bound controls, you can create a BindingContext for just that container control and its controls.
trans-unit.target: 와 같은 컨테이너 컨트롤을 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤을 포함 하기 바로 해당 컨테이너 컨트롤과 해당 컨트롤에 대 한 BindingContext를 만들 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 폼의 각 부분 관리할 수 있습니다는 자체 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor for more information about creating multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the same data source.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>여러 개 만드는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 생성자 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>동일한 데이터 원본에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the BindingContext of that form.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>컨트롤을 폼을 데이터 집합에서 테이블의 열에 바인딩 양식을 BindingContext와 통신 하는 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The BindingContext, in turn, talks to the specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for that data association.
trans-unit.target: BindingContext, 통신 특정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>해당 데이터 연결에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: If you queried the `Position` property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, it would report the current record for the binding of that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 쿼리하면는 `Position` 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, 해당 바인딩에 대 한 현재 레코드를 보고 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the BindingContext for the form it is on.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>컨트롤이 바인딩되는 `FirstName` 의 열 한 `Customers` 테이블에 `dataSet1` BindingContext의 폼에 대 한를 통해 데이터 집합.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: ```vb# TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```c# textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` You can add a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```c# textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ```초를 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>컨트롤 (`TextBox2`)를 폼에 바인딩합니다는 `LastName` 의 열은 `Customers` 동일한 데이터 집합의 테이블.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The BindingContext is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`).
trans-unit.target: BindingContext는 첫 번째 바인딩 인식 (`TextBox1` 를 `Customers.FirstName`) 이므로 동일한 사용 한다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>와 텍스트 상자를 모두 동일한 데이터 집합에 바인딩됩니다 (`DataSet1`).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: ```vb# TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```c# textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the BindingContext creates and manages a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```c# textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ```바인딩하는 경우 `TextBox2` 인 다른 데이터 집합 BindingContext 작성 하 고 두 번째 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> 관리

trans-unit.source: It is important to be consistent about how you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> properties; otherwise, the BindingContext creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 방법에 대 한 일관성을 유지 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>속성; 그렇지 않으면 BindingContext 만듭니다 여러 통화 오류가 발생할 동일한 데이터 집합에 대 한 관리자.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated BindingContext objects.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에는 속성과 연관 된 BindingContext 개체를 설정 하는 몇 가지 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code.
trans-unit.target: 코드 전반에 일관성이으로 다음 방법 중 하나를 사용 하 여 속성을 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE] > Most Windows Forms applications bind through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE]>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> 통해 대부분의 Windows Forms 응용 프로그램 바인딩

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component encapsulates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> and exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> programming interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>구성 요소를 캡슐화 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>노출는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>프로그래밍 인터페이스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> for binding, you should use the members exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the BindingContext.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>바인딩에 의해 노출 되는 멤버를 사용 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>"currency" 조작할 수 (즉, `Position`) BindingContext 수행 하지 않고.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to have multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> instances for the same data source, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and set it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property of an object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 여러 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> 에서 상속 되는 개체의 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> 을 설정 하 고</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> 동일한 데이터 원본에 대 한 인스턴스 만들기</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> 를 포함 하려는 경우

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects (from two different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects), you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> properties of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to different values.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 있는 경우 두 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>개체 (에서 서로 다른 두 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>개체)를 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>각 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>서로 다른 값으로.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하면 각 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤 집합을 같은 데이터 원본에서 다른 값을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 컬렉션에 특정 데이터 원본에 연결 된입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>연관 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 컬렉션에 특정 데이터 원본에 연결 된입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: dataSource is .
trans-unit.target: dataSourceis .

trans-unit.source: -or- listManager is .
trans-unit.target: -or- listManager is .

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 모든 컬렉션을 지웁니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 지웁니다.

trans-unit.source: Always raises a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> when handled.
trans-unit.target: 항상 한 <xref:System.NotImplementedException>처리 될 때.</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: The CollectionChanged event is obsolete and always raises a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> when handled.
trans-unit.target: CollectionChanged 이벤트 사용 되지 않으며 항상는 <xref:System.NotImplementedException>처리 될 때.</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 모든 경우에에서 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> 포함는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정 된 데이터 원본과 관련 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>가능한 데이터 원본 및 컨트롤을 데이터 소스에 바인딩하는 방법에 대 한 정보는 목록에 대 한 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using only a data source.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>반환에 대 한 정보를 보려면 속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>데이터 원본만 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>데이터 소스를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> 에 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> 포함는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정한 데이터 원본 및 데이터 멤버와 관련 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>가능한 데이터 원본 목록 및 컨트롤을 데이터 소스에 바인딩하는 방법에 대 한 정보에 대 한 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using a data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>반환에 대 한 정보를 보려면 속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>데이터 원본 및 데이터 멤버를 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>데이터 소스를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The information needed to resolve to a specific <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 특정 해결 하는 데 필요한 정보 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> 에 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 읽기 전용인 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>을 항상 반환 하도록 재정의 하 고 `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션이 읽기 전용인 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> that is associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정된 된 데이터 소스와 연결 된입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> you want does not require a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 이 오버 로드를 사용 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>하려면 탐색 경로 필요 하지 않습니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects that use an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, no navigation path is required.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>집합을 관리 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>사용 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>또는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, 탐색 경로가 필요 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Item property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, and never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 항목의 속성은 항상 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, 한 반환 하지 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>가능한 데이터 원본 목록 및 컨트롤을 데이터 소스에 바인딩하는 방법에 대 한 정보에 대 한 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 특정와 연결 된 데이터 원본이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> for the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정된 된 데이터 원본에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> that is associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정한 데이터 원본 및 데이터 멤버와 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects for which the data source contains multiple objects.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 경우이 오버 로드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>집합을 관리 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>데이터 원본을 여러 개체를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> can contain several <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects linked by <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Data.DataSet>여러 포함 될 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>의해 연결 된 <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>개체.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 경우 탐색 경로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>올바른 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> 반환할</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> 수 있도록 필요

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Item property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, when the `dataMember` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 항목 속성은 항상 반환는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>때는 `dataMember` 매개 변수는 유효 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: It will never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 하지 것입니다 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>가능한 데이터 원본 목록 및 컨트롤을 데이터 소스에 바인딩하는 방법에 대 한 정보에 대 한 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list.
trans-unit.target: 경우 원하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>관리 목록에서 탐색 경로 목록 끝나야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code binds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to the order date in a table of orders.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 다음 C# 코드 바인딩하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>orders 테이블에 있는 주문 날짜 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The navigation path includes the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 탐색 경로 포함 된 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> must be retrieved using only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> (which resolves to a list).
trans-unit.target: 그러나는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>만 사용 하 여 검색할 수는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>및 <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>(확인 되는 목록에).</xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ``` When returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, you should use the same data source as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> and modify only the navigation path.
trans-unit.target: ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ```역할에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>만 탐색 경로 수정 하 고</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> 동일한 데이터 소스를 사용 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> 반환 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>여부를 확인 하는 메서드는 원하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>이미 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 특정와 연결 된 데이터 원본이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A navigation path containing the information that resolves to a specific <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 특정 문서로 확인 되는 정보를 포함 하는 탐색 경로 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> for the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정 된 데이터 원본과 데이터 멤버에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified dataMember does not exist within the data source.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 dataMember 데이터 원본 내에 존재 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnCollectionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCollectionChanged 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 삭제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정 된 데이터 원본과 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 데이터 소스는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 제거 하려면.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 제거는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 지정 된 데이터 원본과 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 데이터 소스는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> 제거 하려면.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection into a specified array, starting at the collection index.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 인덱스부터 시작 하는 지정 된 배열에 컬렉션의 요소를 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>에 복사 합니다.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The collection index to begin copying from.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 복사를 시작할 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> objects managed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 총 수를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> 하 여 관리 되는 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of data sources managed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 관리 하는 데이터 원본 수는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 동기화 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>을 항상 반환 하도록 재정의 하 고 `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션이 스레드로부터 안전 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object to use for synchronization (thread safety).
trans-unit.target: 동기화 (스레드로부터의 안전성)에 사용할 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>을 항상 반환 하도록 재정의 하 고 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 대 한 열거자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method allows you to iterate over the collection managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>메서드를 사용 하면에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> 관리 하는 컬렉션을 반복할 수 있습니다 IEnumerable.GetEnumerator를 반환한</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>컬렉션에 대 한.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Associates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> with a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> 를 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is intended update the bindings of components that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, when their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> changes.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 구현 하는 구성 요소 바인딩을 업데이트 사용 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>때 자신의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> 연관 시킬는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> 새와 연결할 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>합니다.
